reviewText:
Done in 45 minutes  - loads of retries.  It's a short game, but it's fun once you get the hang of it.  A couple of stages were gimmies.  It was almost like they were trying to fake you out, but still quite fun.

There were a couple of minor bugs that I noticed - I forget the stage, but one of the orbs wasn't lit and it passed me anyway.  There was also a stage where I used all the orbs, but it wouldn't fail me right away.  I hit 'r' to retry and that got it reset.

Overall, worth the cash and doubly so if we could get some more game modes or more stages.

reviewText:
I just picked this up on sale randomly and played a couple of hour

- The games got 2-3 of hours content in it
- As far as bugs go reading the other reviews i was expects some, but didnt get any that i noticed
- The game is definatly a new puzzler game though

Its not a bad game tbh 6 or 7/10, some more updates will improve that.

Early Access Review

Been playing the game more, up to Stage 27 but cant do it ;X

Its really good game, different than other puzzle games, well worth $3!

To the developer, i notcied a few things

1) Sounds bugged out at the beggining of some levels
2) My retries seem to not display after 100ish
